fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Education and training, Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Communication, Banking and financial services, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives: As a representatieve, GEWU wants to debate with and advice on digital developments, learning methodes, quality criteria in scientific books, adjustments to laws and regulations, starting from a positive view and always based on strong arguments.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: GEWU is the Group of Educational and Scientific Publishers: a member organisation that defends the interests of these specific group of professional publishers.
